urlText: Town Hall Station, Platform 4 escalator maintenance
content:
From 5pm Saturday 2 May until Sunday 21 June, at Town Hall Station, the escalator at the northern end of Platform 4 will be closed for maintenance.

Please follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest escalators, stairs or lift to get on and off the platform. If you need further assistance, please see station staff or call 9379 4110.
subtitle: Town Hall Station, Platform 4 escalator maintenance

properties.speechText: From 5 PM Saturday 2 May to Sunday 7 June, at Town Hall Station, the escalator at the northern end of Platform 4 will be closed for maintenance.

urlText: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17
content:
From 18 May 2020 there will be changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.

Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work will move from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps will be built to connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17

content:
From Monday 1 until Monday 15 June, Fairy Meadow station will have stair access only on platform 1 whilst lift construction works take place.

Please consider using North Wollongong as an alternative if you require a lift or easy access.

For further information or assistance, please ask staff, refer to station signage or call Fairy Meadow station on 4223 5582.
subtitle: Fairy Meadow Station access changes

urlText: Central Station: Lift and Suburban Tunnel temporary closure
content:
From 1am Saturday 13 June to 4am Monday 15 June 2020 the lift between the Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works.

The Suburban Tunnel will also be closed during this period.

An alternative lift is available outside the Opal gates. Please follow the signs and staff directions.

If you need assistance, see station staff.

For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Lift and Suburban Tunnel temporary closure

properties.speechText: From 1 AM Saturday 13 June to 4 AM Monday 15 June 20-20 the lift between the Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works.

urlText: Green Square lift outage - between concourse and street level
content:
Due to maintenance, the lift between the concourse and street level is temporarily out of service.

The lift is expected to be out of service until 9 September.

If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative.

For further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.
subtitle: Green Square lift outage - between concourse and street level

urlText: St Marys Station lift temporarily unavailable
content:
From Sunday 14 June to Sunday 16 August 2020 the lift between the concourse and platforms 1 and 2 will be temporarily unavailable due to scheduled upgrade works.

If you require a lift or easy access please change at Mount Druitt or Werrington station to get to your destination.

For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7525.
subtitle: St Marys Station lift temporarily unavailable
